mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(nNum, mId, nTitle, nContent, nHit, nCreated) VALUES(#{nNum}, #{mId}, #{nTitle}, #{nContent}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT n.nNum, n.mId, nTitle, nHit, TO_CHAR(nCreated, 'YYYY-MM-DD') nCreated, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.mId=m.mId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT nNum, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY nNum ) n ON n.nNum=n.nNum ORDER BY nNum DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.mId=m.mId

SELECT n.nNum, n.mId, nTitle, nHit, nCreated, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.mId=m.mId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT nNum, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY nNum ) f ON n.nNum=f.nNum
ORDER BY nNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT nNum, n.mId, nTitle, nContent, nCreated, nHit FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.mId=m.mId WHERE nNum = #{nNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET nHit=nHit+1 WHERE nNum = #{nNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT nNum, nTitle FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.mId=m.mId
AND (nNum > #{nNum})
ORDER BY nNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT nNum, nTitle FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.mId=m.mId
AND (nNum < #{nNum})
ORDER BY nNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeFile(nFileNum, nNum, nSaveFile, nOriginalFile, nFileSize) VALUES (noticeFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{nNum}, #{nSaveFile}, #{nOriginalFile}, #{nFileSize})
